answerText: Lu Xun [or Lu Hsun][10] Lu Xun's stories includes one about the true story of this man, who is unable to draw a perfect circle or recite any lines from a Chinese opera before he is executed.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 12 | 17 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One story by this author describes a headless monster with a female body whose eyes are on his nipples. For 10 points each: [10] Name this author who wrote "Forging the Swords," one of his stories from Old Tales Retold. He also wrote the collection A Call to Arms.
